desc_c: 死亡登記數字 (註釋 1) (註釋 2)

desc_e: (note 1) Figures for 2020 are provisional and are revised from time to time.

desc_c: (註釋 2) 死亡登記數字的總計包括一個小數目不知性別的死亡人數。
desc_e: (note 2) The total number of registered deaths includes a small number of deaths of unknown sex.
